data.name: 迷霧國度: 傳承 Myth of Mist：Legacy 原聲帶Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
About this Music Soundtrack:

This is the Myth of Mist：Legacy OST, including 25 songs designed specifically for this game. From rural town with green field to oasis city ; From magical college city to snow covered towering fortress. If you like music full of classical fantasy style, we believe you will like our OST too.

Let us lead as musical note, taking you to the fantastic adventure experience!
